plot: An escaped homicidal maniac rummages through a garage, picking up an old garden scythe. Venturing out only in the evenings, the killer resembles the Grim Reaper as he goes on his murderous rampage.
title: The Scythe
plot_es: An escaped homicidal maniac rummages through a garage, picking up an old garden scythe. Venturing out only in the evenings, the killer resembles the Grim Reaper as he goes on his murderous rampage.
plot_en: An escaped homicidal maniac rummages through a garage, picking up an old garden scythe. Venturing out only in the evenings, the killer resembles the Grim Reaper as he goes on his murderous rampage.
